archimate:BusinessService.name: Corporate Deposits
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Documentation :
Example of use:
A corporate customer books a deposit to its Corporate Deposit account
Business Purpose : Orchestrate the different flavors of corporate deposit accounting facilities (including term or demand) including the handling of associated services and fees
Документация :
Пример использования:
Корпоративный клиент бронирует депозит на свой корпоративный депозитный счет
деловая цель : Организация различных видов корпоративных средств учета депозитов (включая срок или требование), включая обработку связанных с ними услуг и сборов
Service Domain - Corporate Deposits This service domain handles the fulfillment of corporate deposit facilities (primarily demand) including the handling of interest payments and service fees. The corporate deposit facility is generally used as part of cash management to balance liquidity requirements and interest returns on excess funds
Executive Summary This service domain handles the fulfillment of instances of the corporate deposit product
Examples Of Use A corporate customer books a deposit to its Corporate Deposit account
